name: Redtail Jet Center FBO
about: Redtail Jet Center FBO, established in 1978, has a rich history of serving aviation needs. Originally focused on flying customers on and off the river, the company has expanded its services over the years. Today, Redtail offers comprehensive flight instruction through its academy, providing personalized lessons tailored to individual schedules. Students fly with experienced instructors for a minimum of one hour per lesson, with flexibility to accommodate daily, weekly, or as-needed schedules. Located at the Canyonlands Field Airport in Moab, Utah, Redtail Jet Center FBO is committed to delivering high-quality aviation services and training, true to its roots and dedicated to the future of aviation. Redtail continues to be a trusted name in aviation, offering a world-class learning environment for aspiring pilots.
